Description: Pomegranate pendant: from a heavy loop in opaque turquoise-blue glass a pomegranate, inverted, is pendent. It is of the same glass as the loop; glossy surface. A yellow thread encircles the centre of the body and outlines the foliations which are so typical of this fruit. Once worn from wires through the ear-lobe.
Curator's comments: Pair with 1837,0413.55 (EA 48064) Bibliography: Sale Catalogue, Giovanni d’Athanasi Collection, Sotheby, London, 5 March 1836 and again on 13-20 March 1837, lot 358.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.36, p.36)
